forum.content:
挪威極光之旅

趕快來完成你的夢想清單
日期 ： 2017/01/25-2017/02/05
預算：希望壓在6萬上下
賞極光地點： Tromso 北歐高緯度賞極光熱門城市
人數：目前一男一女

目前訂了2015/01/28-2/4 Taipei-Oslo來回機票，希望可以再找3位同遊，也可以一起share 小木屋。
此行主要是會去Tromso追極光，至少待個四天，有多餘時間應該會搭挪威縮影參觀其他景點、峽灣或參加雪地行程，因預算不是太多，可能不會跑太多地方。
若有興趣可以先加賴討論elliott.chen
旅伴人選會篩選喔，請大家先自介一下。
基本上希望找跟這個網站的人選一樣http://www.tromsoaurora.com/qa.html
http://judyer101010.pixnet.net/blog/post/437393923-%E...%9A)%E9%83%BD%E9%81%A9
http://missrachelnina.pixnet.net/blog/post/240456370-...8%AE%E6%97%85%E4%BC%B4

Day 1 2017/01/25 (Wed)
TainanBus → TPE airportair→CAN airportair→Guangzhou exit→AMS airportair

Day 2 2017/01/26 (Thu)
AMS airportair→OSL airportairport express train→ Oslo-check in →Tour Oslo→Stay in Oslo-Citybox Oslo

Day 3 2017/01/27 (Fir)
OsloNorway in a nutshell Railway→MyrdalNorway in a nutshell Railway→Flåm- check in Flåm Hostel→Tour Flåm→Stay in Flåm- Flåm Marina & Apartments

Day 4 2017/01/28 (Sat)
FlamNorway in a nutshell Cruise→GudvangenNorway in a nutshell Bus→VossNorway in a nutshell Railway→Bergen-check in→Tour Bergen→Stay in Bergen-Marken Guesthouse

Day 5 2017/01/29 (Sun)
Tour Bergen→Stay in Bergen-Marken Guesthouse

Day 6 2017/01/30 (Mon)
Bergenair→Tromso→Stay in Tromso-Ersfjordbotn Brygge AS
Day 7 2017/01/31 (Tue)
Tour Tromso→Stay in Tromso-Ersfjordbotn Brygge AS

Day 8 2017/02/1 (Wed)
Tour Tromso→Stay in Tromso-Ersfjordbotn Brygge AS

Day 9 2017/02/2 (Thu)
Tour Tromso→Stay in Tromso-Ersfjordbotn Brygge AS

Day 10 2017/02/3 (Fri)
TromsoFlybussen - Airport Express Coach→Tromso airportair→Oslo-check in→Tour Oslo→Stay in Oslo-Citybox Oslo

Day 11 2017/02/4 (Sat)
Osloairport express train→OSL airportair→AMS airportair→CAN airport

Day 12 2017/02/5 (Sun)
CAN airportair→TPE airport Bus →Tainan
forum.title: 2017/01/25-2017/02/05春節挪威極光揪團
